author: OpenAI Codex
install_msg: Thanks for installing gpt5assistant. Configure with [p]gpt5 config and set your OpenAI API key via [p]set api openai api_key,<key>.
name: gpt5assistant
short: GPT-5 Assistant via OpenAI Responses API
description: Production-ready assistant cog using OpenAI Responses API (gpt-5) with native tools: web_search, file_search, code_interpreter, and gpt-image-1.
end_user_data_statement: This cog sends conversation text and optional files to OpenAI to provide responses. It stores minimal configuration and usage counters per guild.
